qas.question: What causes the timing of migration?

answers.text: celestial cues from the sun and stars

qas.question: How else to migrating birds navigate?
What might help migrating birds navigate?

context: The timing of migration seems to be controlled primarily by <a0_0>changes in day length<a0_0/>. Migrating birds navigate using <a1_0>celestial cues from the sun and stars<a1_0/>, <a2_0>the earth's magnetic field<a2_0/>, and probably also <a3_0>mental maps<a3_0/>.
